solution_line_template: The number of students accepted to the university is {total_applicants} * {acceptance_rate_decimal} = <<{total_applicants}*{acceptance_rate_decimal}={accepted_students}>>{accepted_students} students

The number of students who choose to attend the university is {accepted_students} * {attendance_rate_decimal} = <<{accepted_students}*{attendance_rate_decimal}={attending_students}>>{attending_students} students
